courses.title: Introduction to Computer Science
courses.syllabus: This course covers fundamental concepts in computer science...
courses.summary: Learn the basics of computer science, covering algorithms, data structures, and more.

courses.title: Modern World History
courses.syllabus: Exploring significant global events from the 18th century to the present...
materials: Textbook: History of the Modern World
courses.summary: Dive into the events that shaped the modern world, from revolutions to technological advancements.

courses.title: Introduction to Psychology
courses.syllabus: Explore the fundamental principles of psychology and its various subfields...
courses.summary: Gain insight into the human mind and behavior through the lens of psychology.

courses.title: Artificial Intelligence Fundamentals
courses.syllabus: An overview of AI concepts, including machine learning, neural networks, and natural language processing...
materials: Textbook: Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach
courses.summary: Explore the cutting-edge field of artificial intelligence and its practical applications.

courses.title: Creative Writing Workshop
courses.syllabus: Develop your writing skills through exercises, workshops, and peer feedback...
courses.summary: Unlock your creativity and express yourself through the art of writing.

courses.title: Fundamentals of Microeconomics
courses.syllabus: An introduction to the principles of microeconomics, including supply and demand, consumer behavior, and market structures...
courses.summary: Gain a deeper understanding of how individuals and firms make economic decisions in various market environments.

courses.title: Astrophysics: Exploring the Universe
courses.syllabus: Delve into the mysteries of the cosmos, from celestial mechanics to the origins of the universe...
materials: Textbook: Astrophysics for People in a Hurry
courses.summary: Embark on a journey through space and time to understand the wonders of the universe.

courses.title: Data Science with Python
courses.syllabus: Learn the essentials of data science using Python, including data analysis, visualization, and machine learning...
courses.summary: Master the tools and techniques used by data scientists to extract insights from data.

courses.title: Introduction to Philosophy
courses.syllabus: Examine fundamental philosophical questions and theories, from ethics to metaphysics...
courses.summary: Engage in critical thinking and explore the fundamental concepts that shape human thought.

courses.title: Environmental Science
courses.syllabus: Study the complex interactions between humans and the environment, including ecosystems, pollution, and sustainability...
courses.summary: Gain an understanding of environmental issues and explore solutions for a sustainable future.
